ticket.title: ARel support for `WITH [RECURSIVE]` queries
ticket.original-body:
PostgreSQL docs on performing WITH RECURSIVE queries: http://www.postgresql.org/docs/8.4/static/queries-with.html This makes it possible to query tree-like tables in a single query.
Examples of the queries: https://gist.github.com/783520
Reference: http://twitter.com/#!/tenderlove/status/27119261860237312
